Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: Had the fried chicken bun and loaded fries. Best chicken burger I have had in the Netherlands and possibly even ever. Loaded Fries were super hot, but luckily I can handle spice.  Staff were lovely, and we will 100% be back to try the rest of the menu.

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text:
Great place in vibrant Amsterdam West for the best burgers.

Review Text: The fried chicken bun is hands down the best sandwich you'll find in Amsterdam. Their fries are also always super fresh and crispy. And on top of that the staff is extremely friendly and always trying their hardest to make sure you're having a good time.

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: Best fries in our lives!

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: Amazing food, great atmosphere with very friendly staff and huge selection of beers. Burgers (beef, chicken and vegan options) are huge and gorgeous, portions are generous. Prices are quite low in my opinion for what your getting. ‚Ä¶

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: The food was tasty, but service was very slow and not attentive at all. Also a bit too warm inside (was a hot day in fairness) and all high tables with stools which I never find especially comfy. Worth a visit for the food if you're in the area!

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: Ordered the 1/2 rotisserie chicken for takeaway and I absolutely enjoyed it! The texture was juicy and tender and it was so flavourful! Loved the smokey touch to it too. I would recommend ordering it with the blue cheese ranch dressing. ‚Ä¶

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: The burgers here are just devine! Absolutely love the balance of flavours and diligence of the chefs. Sweet fries with that gooey cheese sauce are just unbeatable. No doubt, best burger in Amsterdam. Keep it coming, guys!

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: I can‚Äôt speak to in the restaurant these days but do not order on Uber. Chicken was dry like bad humour and my housemate makes a better beyond burger.

Review Text: By far the best burger I‚Äôve had in Amsterdam! Great wings/fries as well. Amazing hospitality (from a distance) from owners/workers during such a strange time of self isolation. Can‚Äôt wait to come here and sit outside when restaurants are allowed to have customers again!

Review Text: We got the chicken burger and the jalapenos fries. Both were superb. The fries were mouthwatering. Just spicy enough. The burger also was extremely grateful. The chicken was crispy and pretty well done. The prices were also very logical.

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: I ordered Rotisserie Amsterdam via Deliveroo on 1st January. I'm hoping that the experience in no way sets the tone for the rest of the year. I'd ordered chicken, fries, ribs, corn and a beer. A half-cooked chicken, corn, and the wrong ‚Ä¶

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: Food was Nasty in a good way. if you want to get a good greasy burger with hot wing and blue cheese sauce on the side, this is the place! Fries with jalape√±os were a big too soft but not bad. Kitchen was closed with no head notice ‚Ä¶

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: Chicken wings were awesome, the sauce was interesting. Cheeseburger over fries was definitely an interesting idea and good, but I will go for burgers next time - just not my cup of tea.

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: Some of the best burgers in town. Our family's favorite is basically any burger but then with the addition of "chili crunch" (peanuts & chili) - delish! Fun selection of beers & good music & attentive staff

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: One of the best restaurant in Amsterdam hands down. Wings were amazing, amazing hamburger, amazing rotisserie chicken. I've never had chicken like this. It's a must go to place. Drinks are really good to. Chairs are not really comfortable so be prepared to sit on high tops.

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: Burger bar with a difference. Fun decor and vibe for drinks and great food. Beef burgers are a proper mouthful; don't order the chicken burgers, they are disappointing by comparison. The loaded fries are tasty and filling so order 2 to share between 4 or 5 people.

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: By far the best burgers I've ever eaten. Had the Reuben special and their fried chicken burger (with added kimchi). Could not fault a single thing, will definitely be back for more.

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: Great food menu and the music was awesome. Excellent customer service

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam
Review Text: Nice beer selection, good service and lovely food. The rotisserie chicken was fantastic. I didn't try the burgers, but they look so good I need to come back to this place to try one.

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam

Review Text: How can you resist to roasted / smoked chicken ?... Quick service, delicious fries and secret sauces. It is advised to reserve before, it can quickly get crowded. Always ask for the Burger of the Month, they usually have really surprising recipes ( caviar, yoghurt sauce... )

Review Text: Really cool place. Sympatic atmosphere where you feel like home. Great food - ribs are top! Beer is very good as well.

Name: Rotisserie Amsterdam

Review Text: Simple but good food, reasonable prices, nice interior and design and above all, very friendly (and not fake friendly) staff, I was glad to discover the "Bols Genever" and have dinner with such a warm atmosphere! Keep it on that way!
